author: Kamran Rahman and Alice Miranda Ollstein
title: How states are responding to coronavirus, in 7 maps
description: The spread of the outbreak is unprecedented — and so are the measures states are taking to fight it.
content:
Meanwhile, Iowa is the only state to not mandate social distancing measures. Gov. Kim Reynolds said any decision to restrict Iowans movement will be based on outbreak data "to make sure that we're not shutting down a state where we don't need to."
Many state… [+2193 chars]
